title: [Support] How Can Make my Left-Mouse Click  Attack Champions Only?
body:
Searched GOOGLE, No Results N/A


to add --->**Draven;Champion Support Question**


[Support] Riot Approved Items for Universal for _Draven_ seems to not update with current patch meta, can you please update the essential items for _Draven_ to meet Maximized Damage Goals?

replies.body:
There's no way to modify the left mouse click to only attack champions, as it's not available in-game. Any modifications outside of the game are not officially supported, so I won't be able to chime in on those. 

Your other question doesn't fall under Help & Support and I'd recommend posting it to the Gameplay sub-board. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Thanks for Fast Reply!, um no further questions, how was your'e day today Targons Blade?
